document_data.name: Dundeld Nanther
document_data.mainbody: '''Dundeld Nanther''' was the Lord Envoy of the [[Council of Lords (Melvaunt)|Council of Lords]] in [[Melvaunt]] around [[1367 DR]]. His death in [[1373]] nearly started a new civil war inside the city.
document_data.Description: Dundeld was an old man. This fact had all three of the powerful families of Melvaunt hungry to fill his vacant seat on the council, in the event of his likely death, with one of their own.
